data.title: 10 Hotel Terbaik di Gulskogen Manor, Drammen
data.meta_description: Temukan hotel terbaik di dekat Gulskogen Manor di Drammen dengan ulasan, foto, dan peta asli. Pesan melalui Trip.com untuk mendapatkan harga terbaik dan tanpa biaya reservasi.
data.text:
A stay at Comfort Hotel Union Brygge - Drammen places you in the heart of Drammen, steps from Union Scene and Papirbredden. This upscale hotel is 0.5 mi (0.7 km) from Stromsgodset Kirke and 0.6 mi (0.9 km) from Stromsgodset Church. Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including a fitness center and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, an arcade/game room, and a hair salon. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Stay in one of 140 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Digital television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Selengkapnya

A stay at Scandic Ambassadeur Drammen places you in the heart of Drammen, within a 10-minute walk of Drammens Museum and Drammen Water Park. This hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Papirbredden and 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Union Scene. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour health club, or other amenities including complimentary wireless internet access and ski storage. Additional amenities at this hotel include a hair salon, a fireplace in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance. Satisfy your appetite at Ambassadeur Restaurant, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. This hotel has 14 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Stay in one of 230 guestrooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Housekeeping is provided daily, and both irons/ironing boards and rollaway/extra beds (surcharge) are available on request.

Selengkapnya

A stay at Quality Hotel River Station places you in the heart of Drammen, within a 5-minute walk of Stromso Church and Port of Drammen. This hotel is 0.6 mi (0.9 km) from Drammens Museum and 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Drammen Water Park. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features gift shops/newsstands, a fireplace in the lobby, and a vending machine. You can enjoy a meal at The Social Bar & Bistro serving the guests of Quality Hotel River Station, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily. Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Planning an event in Drammen? This hotel has 3735 square feet (347 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and 8 meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge. Make yourself at home in one of the 247 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Conveniences include desks and sofa beds, and housekeeping is provided on request.

Selengkapnya

A stay at Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden places you in the heart of Drammen, steps from Stromso Church and Port of Drammen. This beach hotel is 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Drammens Museum and 1.1 mi (1.7 km) from Drammen Water Park. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Featured amenities include complimentary wired internet access, a business center, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 127 guestrooms, featuring heated floors. Complimentary wired internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Selengkapnya

Located in Asker, Storstua Omsorg og konferansesenter is a 1-minute drive from Royken Historielag and 5 minutes from Lower Hajum Farm. This hotel is 21.3 mi (34.3 km) from Tusenfryd Amusement Park and 3.9 mi (6.4 km) from Hyggenstranda. Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access and an arcade/game room. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Storstua Omsorg og konferansesenter, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM. The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 20 guestrooms. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Selengkapnya

With a stay at Emma Gjestehus in Bærum, you'll be 1.9 mi (3.1 km) from Sandvika Center and 9.7 mi (15.7 km) from Gustav Vigeland Sculpture Park. This guesthouse is 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Viking Ship Museum and 11.2 mi (18 km) from Karl Johan Gate. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access. Additional features at this guesthouse include a television in a common area, a picnic area, and bike parking. Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and coffee/tea in a common area. This guesthouse has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 16 guestrooms featuring microwaves. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

Selengkapnya

Located in Modum, Tyrifjord Hotell is on a lake, a 5-minute drive from Heggen Church and 5 minutes from Kroderbanen. This upscale hotel is 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Vikersundbakken Ski Flying Hill and 3.6 mi (5.9 km) from Furumo Svommehall. Relax on the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities such as an outdoor tennis court. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, ski storage, and wedding services. Enjoy international cuisine at Hollenderiet Brasserie, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 5:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Modum? This hotel has 6997 square feet (650 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 64 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Selengkapnya

A stay at Reenskaug Hotel places you in the heart of Frogn, within a 5-minute walk of Drobak Aquarium and Tregaarden Christmas House. This upscale hotel is 1 mi (1.5 km) from Galleri Finsrud and 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from Follo Museum. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access. This hotel also features concierge services, a television in a common area, and a banquet hall. Satisfy your appetite with international cuisine at Bolette, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 28 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and minibars. 37-inch Smart televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Selengkapnya

With a stay at Scandic Fornebu in Bærum (Fornebu), you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Viking Ship Museum and Color Line Ferry Terminal. This upscale hotel is 5.7 mi (9.2 km) from Aker Brygge and 5.7 mi (9.2 km) from Karl Johan Gate. Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a 24-hour fitness center and bicycles to rent. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli serving guests of Scandic Fornebu. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 334 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and irons/ironing boards.

Selengkapnya
